    A

    AddGalaxy(cGalaxy) - Method in class Data.cUniverse
    Appends a galaxy to the end of the universe's galaxy list.
    AddGalaxy(cGalaxy, int) - Method in class Data.cUniverse
    Inserts a galaxy at a specific index in the universe's galaxy list.
    AddMoon(cPlanet) - Method in class Data.cPlanet
    Appends a moon to the end of the planet's moon list.

    Inserts a moon at a specific index in the planet's moon list.
    AddPlanet(cPlanet) - Method in class Data.cStar
    Appends a planet to the end of the star system's planet list.
    AddPlanet(cPlanet, int) - Method in class Data.cStar
    Inserts a planet at a specific index in the star system's planet list.
    AddStar(cStar) - Method in class Data.cGalaxy
    Appends a star to the end of the galaxy's star list.
    AddStar(cStar, int) - Method in class Data.cGalaxy
    Inserts a star at a specific index in the galaxy's star list.

    C

    cGalaxy - Class in Data
    Represents a galaxy containing stars in the StarViewer application.
    cGalaxy(String) - Constructor for class Data.cGalaxy
    Constructs a galaxy with the specified name and default type (SBc).

    Constructs a galaxy with the specified name, default type (SBc), and logger.
    cGalaxy.eGalaxyType - Enum Class in Data
    Enumeration of galaxy types based on the Hubble classification system.
    ClearGalaxies() - Method in class Data.cUniverse
    Clears all galaxies from the universe.
    ClearMoons() - Method in class Data.cPlanet
    Clears all moons from the planet.
    ClearPlanets() - Method in class Data.cStar
    Clears all planets from the star system.
    ClearStars() - Method in class Data.cGalaxy
    Clears all stars from the galaxy.
